channel.title: Family Adventures | NORTHEAST INDIA on North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India
channel.description: Recent content in Family Adventures | NORTHEAST INDIA on North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India

item.title: Assam: Jewels of the Brahmaputra | FAMILY HOLIDAY
item.description: Family exploration of the Brahmaputra Valley The setting for this family holiday is the lush Brahmaputra valley of Assam.

item.title: Meghalaya: Natures Amusement Park | FAMILY HOLIDAY
item.description: Family adventures in the Khasi & Jaintia hills This Adventure holiday for the family is set in hilly Meghalaya.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): India's far east | FAMILY HOLIDAY
item.description: Far eastern explorations This active adventure holiday for the family is set in some of the only flatlands of Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (West): Call of the Mountains | FAMILY HOLIDAY
item.description: Family adventures in the gateway of Tibet On this family adventure we take you to Western Arunachal Pradesh, a region bordering Bhutan and Tibet.
